confirm-email-update.title: Confirm Email Update
confirm-email-update.subtitle: Please confirm your email address.
confirm-email-update.instructions: To confirm your new email address for getnative, please click the button below.
confirm-email-update.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please contact us so it doesn't happen again.

email-update-success.message: Your email address for getnative has been successfully updated.
email-update-success.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please contact us so it doesn't happen again.

errors.JWT: An error occurred while processing JWT
errors.UserMissing: No user with this email exists
errors.ResourceNotFound: No resource was found for the given conditions
errors.ForeignKeyConstraintError: Failed to take the specified action on the requested resource due to foreign key constraint
errors.MetadataMissing: No metadata was provided in the request
errors.MetadataFormat: The provided metadata is not parsable JSON

notify-email-update.title: Notification Of Email Update
notify-email-update.message: Your email address for getnative has been updated to <%= updatedEmail %>. This email address will no longer receive messages from getnative. If you think this is a mistake, please contact us immediately.
notify-email-update.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please contact us so it doesn't happen again.

password-updated.title: Password Updated
password-updated.message-1: Your password for signing in to getnative was recently changed. If you did this yourself, then there's nothing to worry about.
password-updated.message-2: If you did not make this change, please notify us.
password-updated.message-3: Either way, feel free to reach out with any questions you might have. We're here to help.
password-updated.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please contact us so it doesn't happen again.

registration-email-confirmed.title: Email Address Confirmed
registration-email-confirmed.message: Thank you for signing up with getnative! Your email address has successfully been confirmed.
registration-email-confirmed.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please contact us so it doesn't happen again.

welcome.title: Welcome to getnative!
welcome.instructions: Thank you for registering for getnative! Please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
welcome.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please contact us so it doesn't happen again.
